TextView.android:text: IIMs tap alumni for graduates' job placement
IIMs are leveraging their powerful alumni networks to place their largest-ever graduating classes amid a turbulent global job market.

The alumni, many in senior positions across India Inc. and overseas, are crucial for securing jobs in a year where top management schools are struggling. Alumni at the CXO-level can open up job opportunities even when companies are not actively hiring. The outreach to alumni has never been as high, reflecting the desperation to ensure every student gets placed.
